closet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a cupboard built into the wall of a room from the floor to the ceiling
closet.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a closet full of beautiful clothes
closet.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to shut someone in a room away from other people in order to discuss something private, to be alone etc
closet.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: All morning he’d been closeted with various officials.
Don’t let her closet herself away in her room.
